snippet: For a country with a population about the size of Minnesota, Finland has produced some giant global hits in the mobile business, like the phone maker Nokia and Rovio, the company responsible for Angry Birds. A Finnish mobile games start-up called...
abstract: For a country with a population about the size of Minnesota, Finland has produced some giant global hits in the mobile business, like the phone maker Nokia and Rovio, the company responsible for Angry Birds. A Finnish mobile games start-up called Supercell wants its crack at glory too.

headline.main: From the Land of Angry Birds, a Mobile Game Maker Lifts Off
